functions.name: enrollInExperiment
functions.description: Enrolls a user into an experiment based on the provided JSON.

parameters.name: jsonData
parameters.description: An object representing the experiment to enroll in.

functions.name: enrollWithFeatureConfig
functions.description: Enrolls a user into an experiment based on the provided feature configuration.

parameters.name: featureId
parameters.description: A string containing the selected feature ID.

parameters.name: featureValue
parameters.description: An object representing the feature configuration of the experiment to enroll in.

parameters.name: isRollout
parameters.description: An boolean representing whether or not this should be a rollout.

functions.name: getFeatureConfigs
functions.description: Get all the feature IDs from Nimbus.

functions.name: setCollection
functions.description: Set the collection ID to the given collectionId.

functions.name: updateRecipes
functions.description: Get all recipes from remote settings and update enrollments.

parameters.name: forceSync
parameters.description: Force Remote Settings to sync recipe collection before updating.

functions.name: forceEnroll
functions.description: Force enroll into a specific branch of an experiment.

parameters.name: recipe
parameters.description: The recipe of the experiment to enroll into.

parameters.name: branchSlug
parameters.description: The specific branch slug of the experiment to enroll into.

functions.name: getExperimentStore
functions.description: Get all enrollments from the experiment store.

functions.name: unenroll
functions.description: Unenroll from an active experiment in the store.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The slug of the experiment to unenroll from.

functions.name: deleteInactiveEnrollment
functions.description: Delete an inactive experiment from the store.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The slug of the experiment to delete from the store.

functions.name: generateTestIds
functions.description: Generate Normandy UserId respective to a branch for a specific experiment.

parameters.name: recipe
parameters.description: The recipe of the experiment to generate the UserId for.

parameters.name: branchSlug
parameters.description: The specific branch slug of the experiment.
